text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 2, line 21, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) the positive contribution a companion animal does or could make to an individual’s wellbeing;”

text.quote: 000: Clause 9, page 8, line 24, after “family” insert “, companion animals”
000: Clause 12, page 10, line 24, after “family” insert “(including companion animals)”
